name: Escenario
description:
"Escenario" means "stage" in spanish, like a music performer or a theater actor would mean to say it. 

I remember some years ago being sitting on my kitchen late at night with the desire to create but i felt like editing the performance of something or someone. I remember wishing i had models with me at the time so we could experiment with movement or gestures... but i was alone, also my family is one of those families that goes to sleep at 10 or so and after very early at night you dont hear a single noise in the house, so i had to be silent on whatever i chose to do too hehe so i felt maybe i could record my self but i have always been shy to be infront of the camera so i just kinda tied up a white towel to a couple of chairs and infront of it i "acted" only with my hands: i took what i thought was the most interesting object near me at the moment (a knife) and i started pointing at the camera with it. As if i was threatening it idk why... i even made some swings, as if i wanted it to know i was being serious. 

i hope i didnt cut it 2 much...
